aws_customer_gateway.description:
Provides a customer gateway inside a VPC. These objects can be
connected to VPN gateways via VPN connections, and allow you to
establish tunnels between your network and the VPC.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the gateway's Internet-routable external interface.

type.description: The type of customer gateway. The only type AWS

tags.description: Tags to apply to the gateway.
